title: Apartment for rent
description: This apartment is available for rent. It features a spacious living area, kitchen, bathroom, and bedroom. The apartment is located in a convenient neighborhood with easy access to public transportation and various amenities.

importantInformation.viewings: Viewings can be scheduled upon request.
importantInformation.deliveryDate: The apartment is available for immediate move-in.

rentalDetails.rentalAgreement: A rental agreement will be provided.
rentalDetails.availableSince: This apartment has been available since the listing date.
rentalDetails.status: The apartment is currently available for rent.
rentalDetails.acceptance: Acceptance of the rental application is subject to approval.

neighbourhood: The apartment is located in a desirable neighborhood with various amenities and good transportation links.
